TopicTitle: Crashing hourly, can't figure out why

Articles.Content:
Here are my crash reports, I suspect its memory issues but I'd like to be sure, so frustrating to be only able to play for an hour or so ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
